messages.messageBody:
"I did take offense to your post because you were calling my observation
nonsense. "

If a post bothers someone, stick to discussing the issues, not the persons post please.

What I read, is that Robyn questioned the validity of basing an entire philosophy on three people. Anecdotal evidence can be useful, but basing an opinion on three people's experience is shoddy evidence at best.
Let's stick to discussing ideas. If a post offends, or causes ruffled feathers, maybe that's a time to question why. There may be some deep hurt dredged up, but it isn't the responsibility of the poster questioning, to know each persons past and issues.
Robyn questioned faulty logic.
I hope people always do that. I am very positive she meant no hurt feelings, it wasn't about a person, it was about ideas.

Let's get back to discussing unschooling.

Thank you,
Ren
